info.title: Twilio
info.description: Telephony platform that exposes SMS and voice capabilities.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account

get.description: Returns the account details for the {AccountSid}.

post.description: Allows you to modify the 'FriendlyName' for the {AccountSid} via POST.

put.description: Allows you to modify the 'FriendlyName' for the {AccountSid} via PUT.

get.description:
Right now, your credentials are tied to one and only one account, so the list resource only contains your single
					account.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: Only show SMS messages from this phone number

parameters.name: To
parameters.description: Only show SMS messages to this phone number.

parameters.name: DateSent
parameters.description:
Only show SMS messages sent on this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD. Example: DateSent=2009-07-06. You can also specify
					inequality, such as DateSent lt YYYY-MM-DD for SMS messages that were sent on or before midnight on a date, and DateSent
					gt YYYY-MM-DD for SMS messages sent on or after midnight on a date.

get.description: Returns a list of SMS messages associated with your account identified by {AccountSid}.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account

parameters.name: SMSMessageSid
parameters.description: Represents a 34 character string that uniquely identifies this SMSMessage

get.description: Returns a single SMS message specified by the provided {SMSMessageSid}.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

get.description: Returns the list of outgoing caller ids for this account

post.description: Adds a new caller id to your account

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: OutgoingCallerIdSid
parameters.description: Represents a 34 character string that uniquely identifies this caller Id

get.description: Returns a single outgoing caller id specified by the provided {OutgoingCallerIdSid}

post.description:
Updates the outgoing caller id specified by the provided {OutgoingCallerIdSid} and returns the updated resource if
					successful via POST.

put.description:
Updates the outgoing caller id specified by the provided {OutgoingCallerIdSid} and returns the updated resource if
					successful via PUT.

delete.description: Deletes the outgoing caller id specified by the provided {OutgoingCallerIdSid}

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: IsoCountryCode
parameters.description: The ISO country code of this phone number

parameters.name: AreaCode
parameters.description: Find phone numbers in the specified Area Code. Only available for North American numbers.

parameters.name: Contains
parameters.description:
A pattern to match phone numbers on. Valid characters are '*' and [0-9a-zA-Z]. The '*' character will match any single
					digit.

parameters.name: InRegion
parameters.description:
Limit results to a particular region (i.e. State/Province). Given a phone number, search within the same Region as that
					number.

parameters.name: InPostalCode
parameters.description: Limit results to a particular postal code. Given a phone number, search within the same postal code as that number.

parameters.name: NearLatLong
parameters.description: Given a latitude/longitude pair lat,long find geographically close numbers within Distance miles.

parameters.name: NearNumber
parameters.description: Given a phone number, find a geographically close number within Distance miles. Distance defaults to 25 miles.

parameters.name: InLata
parameters.description:
Limit results to a specific Local access and transport area (LATA). Given a phone number, search within the same LATA as
					that number.

parameters.name: InRateCenter
parameters.description:
Limit results to a specific rate center, or given a phone number search within the same rate center as that number.
					Requires InLata to be set as well.

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Specifies the search radius for a Near- query in miles. If not specified this defaults to 25 miles.

get.description:
Returns a list of local AvailablePhoneNumber resource representations, each representing a phone number that is
					currently available for provisioning within your account.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: IsoCountryCode
parameters.description: The ISO country code of this phone number

parameters.name: Contains
parameters.description:
A pattern to match phone numbers on. Valid characters are '*' and [0-9a-zA-Z]. The '*' character will match any single
					digit.

get.description:
Returns a list of toll-free AvailablePhoneNumber resource representations, each representing a phone number that is
					currently available for provisioning within your account.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: CallSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely idetifies this resource

get.description: Returns the single Call resource identified by {CallSid}.

post.description: Modifies a live call. Modification could be redirection or termination of the call.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

get.description:
Returns a list of phone calls made to and from the account identified by {AccountSid}, sorted by DateUpdated with
					most-recent calls first.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id.

parameters.name: IncomingPhoneNumberSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely idetifies this resource.

get.description: Fetches the details of a phone number purchased from Twilio

post.description: Update an incoming phone number obtained from Twilio via POST.

put.description: Update an incoming phone number obtained from Twilio via PUT.

delete.description: Deletes a phone number purchased from Twilio

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id.

get.description: Returns a list of incoming phone number resources, each representing a phone number given to your account

post.description: Adds a random phone number available for the area depending on the Area Code provided

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: CallSid
parameters.description: Show only recordings made during the call given by this sid.

parameters.name: DateCreated
parameters.description:
Only show recordings created on the given date. Should be formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. You can also specify inequality, such
					as DateCreated(less than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for recordings generated at or before midnight on a date, and
					DateCreated(greater than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for recordings generated at or after midnight on a date.

get.description: Returns a recording list for the {CallSid}

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: CallSid
parameters.description: Show only recordings made during the call given by this sid.

parameters.name: DateCreated
parameters.description:
Only show recordings created on the given date. Should be formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. You can also specify inequality, such
					as DateCreated(less than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for recordings generated at or before midnight on a date, and
					DateCreated(greater than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for recordings generated at or after midnight on a date.

get.description: Returns a recording list associated with this {AccountSid}

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: RecordingSid
parameters.description: The unique id of the Recording this Transcription was made of

get.description:
Each Recording instance resource has a Transcriptions subresource which represents the set of transcriptions generated
					from the recording (if any). Represents the set of transcriptions available for the recording identified by
					{RecordingSid}.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: TranscriptionSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource

get.description: Returns a single Transcription resource representation identified by the given {TranscriptionSid}.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

get.description:
Returns a set of Transcription resource representations that includes paging information, sorted by 'DateUpdated', with
					most recent transcripts first.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: RecordingSid
parameters.description: The unique id of the Recording this Transcription was made of

get.description: Returns a recording

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: NotificationSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.

get.description: Returns a notification

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: Log
parameters.description: Only show notifications for this log, using the integer log values shown above.

parameters.name: MessageDate
parameters.description:
Only show notifications for this date. Should be formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. You can also specify inequality, such as
					MessageDate(less than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for messages logged at or before midnight on a date, and
					MessageDate(greater than or equal to )YYYY-MM-DD for messages logged at or after midnight on a date. When performing a
					date range query with day-granularity make sure the right endpoint is midnight of the next day (e.g. to construct a
					range query for all calls on YYYY-MM-DD use MessageDate(greater than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD(and)MessageDate(less
					than)YYYY-MM-(DD+1)).

get.description: Returns a notification list

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: CallSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource

parameters.name: Log
parameters.description: Only show notifications for this log, using the integer log values shown above.

parameters.name: MessageDate
parameters.description:
Only show notifications for this date. Should be formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. You can also specify inequality, such as
					MessageDate(less than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for messages logged at or before midnight on a date, and
					MessageDate(greater than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for messages logged at or after midnight on a date. When performing a
					date range query with day-granularity make sure the right endpoint is midnight of the next day (e.g. to construct a
					range query for all calls on YYYY-MM-DD use MessageDate(greater than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD(and)MessageDate(less
					than)YYYY-MM-(DD+1)).

get.description: Returns a notification list

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: ConferenceSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this conference.

get.description: Returns a representation of the conference identified by {ConferenceSid}.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: ConferenceSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this conference.

parameters.name: Muted
parameters.description: Only show participants that are muted or unmuted. Either true or false.

get.description: Returns the list of participants in the conference identified by {ConferenceSid}.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Only show conferences currently in with this status. May be init, in-progress, or completed.

parameters.name: FriendlyName
parameters.description: List conferences who's FriendlyName is the exact match of this string.

parameters.name: DateCreated
parameters.description:
Only show conferences that started on this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD. You can also specify inequality, such as
					DateCreated(less than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for conferences that started at or before midnight on a date, and
					DateCreated(greater than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for conferences that started at or after midnight on a date.

parameters.name: DateUpdated
parameters.description:
Only show conferences that were last updated on this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD. You can also specify inequality, such as
					DateUpdated(less than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for conferences that were last updated at or before midnight on a date, and
					DateUpdated(greater than or equal to)YYYY-MM-DD for conferences that were updated at or after midnight on a date.

get.description: Returns a list of conferences within an account identified by {AccountSid}.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

parameters.name: ConferenceSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this conference.

parameters.name: CallSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the call that is connected to this conference.

get.description: Returns a representation of this participant.

delete.description: Kick a participant from a conference.

parameters.name: AccountSid
parameters.description: Represents the unique id of the Account responsible for this caller Id

get.description: Returns the Sandbox resource associated with the account identified by {AccountSid}.

post.description: Updates the Sandbox resource via POST.

put.description: Updates the Sandbox resource via PUT.

info.title: Twilio
